item.title: Laura-marie add a quote by Lorraine Hansberry
item.description: "The thing that makes you exceptional, if you are at all, is inevitably that which must also make you lonely." -- Lorraine Hansberry

item.title: Laura-marie add a quote by Basil the Great
item.description: "When someone steals another's clothes, we call them a thief. Should we not give the same name to one who could clothe the naked and does not? The bread in your cupboard belongs to the hungry; the coat unused in your closet belongs to the one who needs it; the shoes rotting in your closet belong to the one who has no shoes; the money which you hoard up belongs to the poor." -- Basil the Great
